MACIEJ GUMULKA

Data Enthusiast & Electrical Engineer
Portfolio About me

Who am I?

I'm an electrical engineer with passion towards data science. Former startup owner, multiple awards winner, programmer and out-of-the-box thinker.

Machine Learning

I've been heavily occupied with ML since 2018, mainly in anomaly detection. Successfuly deployed projects for many industries:

  • power grids,
  • residential heating systems,
  • space data providers,
  • Li-Ion battery manufacturing.

    • Data Engineering

    I've designed robust databases, built multiple data pipelines, integrated data-capture with battery-testing, performed automated KPI anlysis. My biggest project so far is a traceability system for the entire production factory.

    Web/App Development

    I've built mutiple apps for automated battery testing, as well as deployed websites for my personal projects, startup and competitions.

    Entrepreneurship

    In 2019 I started my own business Land2Plant. The startup has won mutiple awards:

  • EDPR University Challenge (3rd place),
  • EPAE Conference (1st place),
  • Entrepreneurship Journey (2nd place).
    • I have also been awarded 2nd place during the Copernicus Hackathon for a business&technical solution to detect water contamination using space data.

    Leadership

    Leading people comes natural to me. I have sucessfuly managed multiple teams:

  • a 4-persons team working for the municipality of Antwerp (6 months),
  • a team of 4 for my startup (1 year),
  • a 5-persons team during the Copernicus Hackathon (1 month)

    • Engineering

    I have worked in energy and battery sectors. I am knowledgeable of bettery manufacturing and testing, power grids, heating systems and optimization algorithms.
